channel.title: rust on Kim Pham
channel.description: Recent content in rust on Kim Pham

item.title: rustling in the open source maplibre community
item.description: i spent a few months learning rust in the end of 2022 for a few half-formed reasons: it was always a desire of mine to learn systems programming. i really want to get into some deeper programming, i do love the creative solutions that web development can provide at the frontend/backend level, but i’m also interested in computer science concepts and at least understanding the ideas of building for computer science, not just business.
